article_title: Feds: ACA rate increases only 3 percent in NC this year
article_text:
02:34

Two-year-old girl from Brazil sees her mother for the first time thanks to surgery

article_metadata.news-keywords: ACA, Obamacare, Affordable, Care, Act, Premium, Tax, Credit
article_metadata.description: North Carolinians enrolled in the Affordable Care Act saw their health insurance premiums jump 30 percent or more this year, but ACA officials said Tuesday that the real increase was much less: 3 percent.
article_metadata.title: Feds: ACA rate increases only 3 percent in NC this year | News & Observer
